text:
Karla Avelar (born 1978), she is a Salvadoran activist for the rights of transgenders. She is also the Executive Director of Comcavis Trans.
Works.
She also the founded an organisation of transgenders called COMCAVIS TRANS, in 2008. It was made as a support group of TRANS women.
Awards.
In 2017, she was a listed as one of the finalist of the Martin Ennals Award for Human Rights Defenders.

annotations.surface_form: Martin Ennals Award for Human Rights Defenders
